text: `peakflops()`  goes from 54e9 to 212e9 from v1.6.0 to nightly. BLAS 0.3.10 to 0.3.13. CPU is i7-10850H Comet Lake. Hope #39216 will land some day on 1.6-series.

text:
Did OpenBLAS 0.3.10 not recognize the Comet Lake?
You could use <https://github.com/JuliaLinearAlgebra/MKL.jl|MKL.jl> until then.
